TopicTitle: What KSP mission have you done that NASA should do?

Articles.Content: KSP lets you do some amazing things in space exploration. Show us or link to us a mission you've done that you'd REALLY love NASA to do. I've sent a truck to the Mun with all sorts of science gear.

Go to Mars, with people.

It actually bothers me quite a bit that I find it likely that I will be 80 years old and suffering from dementia and we still wont be any closer to sending doing a manned Mars mission.

This.

Better view:

Stock + Habitat Pack
